text: Hindu temple in Singapore. Very traditional construction and you can feel the aura around there. A fully renovated one with delightful designs.

Visited the Sri Arulmigu Murugan Temple on New Year‚Äôs Eve to start the year with divine blessings. üôè Received the blessings of Ma Durga and Lord Ganesh on this auspicious day. The atmosphere was serene despite the crowd, and everyone was incredibly respectful and well-organized in the queues.

The highlight was the prasadam‚Äîa delicious spread of lemon rice, kesari bath, and a flavorful rice upma dish. üçö‚ú® A beautiful and spiritual start to the new year, feeling blessed and grateful! üåü

The Temple is a very colorful temple dedicated to Lord Murugan. The bright decorations and detailed statues are impressive. The temple is lively during festivals and offers a peaceful place for worship. A great spot to experience local traditions and vibrant culture.
Today visited the Temple.Very much appreciated the silent and peaceful Temple.

Happy Diwali to all devotees celebrating this festive season. Crowds and throngs of devotees male or female, folded their palms as they entered this holy temple. Together I joined the crowd and walked around the holy temple and wishing all be blessed with good health, calm & peace within ourselves. May the light remove the darkness within ourselves.
